divs: sighting detailsi came to visit my parents from college that summer in 2004. the evening of that event began with me asking my father to use his hand-bike (it is sort of a bike that exercises your arms). i told him that i wanted to see the sunset and evening twilight meanwhile i ride around the community and then to the store to get some snacks. as i began my three and a half mile trek, i was heading east on el dorado parkway (a circumference road around the community). i didn't notice anything since i was focused on just riding and navigating the bike. when i reached the part of the road that starts heading west back to the entrance of the community, i took a break to drink some water since the tempature that evening was still in the 100s. meanwhile i was drinking some water, i looked up in the sky to look at the evening twilight and there above me approximately between 1000 to 2000 ft, i saw two or three diamond shaped objects glowing in a fiery red\orange\yellow color. there, i started to focus on the big one in the middle. all i have to say is that it was beautiful. i know it wasn't flares or weather ballons since i deal with them in the us army. they were staying in the same exact spot. i started to ride again, however, i kept my attention on them. in my mind, i started thinking that this is sort of something out of steven spielberg's "close encounters of the third kind." the objects kept their positions. as i neared the entrance of the community, i change my focus to the road and started to head back home. i wanted to tell my parents about my experience. i knew that i had my back to the objects when i got near my home. when i got home, i looked up again and they were gone.
trends: There have been 33 other sightings in Maricopa
There were no other sightings in Maricopa on or around August 1st 2004
